item.description: (centos) apache compile $ mkdir -p /opt/apache $ cd /opt/apache $ wget https://dlcdn.apache.org/httpd/httpd-2.4.58.tar.gz $ wget https://dlcdn.apache.org/apr/apr-1.7.4.tar.gz $ wget https://dlcdn.apache.org/apr/apr-util-1.6.3.tar.gz $ wget https://github.com/PCRE2Project/pcre2/releases/download/pcre2-10.42/pcre2-10.42.tar.gz $ cd /opt/apache/apr-1.7.4 && \ ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/src/apr-1.7.4 && \ make && \ make install $ cd /opt/apache/apr-util-1.6.3 && \ ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/src/apr-util-1.6.3 --with-apr=/usr/local/src/apr-1.7.4 && \ make && \ make install $ cd /opt/apache/pcre2-10.42 && \ ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/src/pcre2-10.42 --with-apr=/usr/local/src/apr-1.7.4 && \ make && \ make install $ cd /opt/apache/httpd-2.4.58 && \ .
